// holds the user data
userdb
	uid*		int
	email		varchar
	salt		varchar
	hashpw		varchar
	fname		varchar
	lname		varchar
	admin		boolean
	wage		float
	days		varchar
	picture		varchar
	rfid		varchar

// holds each of the projects that can be worked on
projdb
	pid*		int
	title		varchar
	description	varchar
	active		boolean

// holds each thing that was done that day
workdb
	wid*		int
	uid			int
	did			int
	pid			int
	description	varchar
	tstart		time
	tend		time

// holds the events generated by rfid nodes
rfiddb
	rid*		int
	uid			int
	sid			int
	day			date
	time		time

// holds each of the registered rfid nodes
scannerdb
	sid*		int
	devid		varchar
	name		varchar
	location	varchar

// holds clock in/out data
daydb
	did*		int
	uid			int
	day			date
	tstart		time
	tend		time
	hours		float




Table userdb {
  uid int [primary key]
  email varchar
  salt varchar
  hashpw varchar
  fname varchar
  lname varchar
  admin boolean
  wage float4
  days varchar
  picture varchar
  rfid varchar
}

Table projdb {
  pid int [primary key]
  title varchar
  description varchar
  active varchar
}

Table workdb {
  wid int [primary key]
  uid int
  did int
  pid int
  description varchar
  tstart time
  tend time
}

Table rfiddb {
  rid int [primary key]
  uid int
  sid int
  day date
  time time
}

Table scannerdb {
  sid int [primary key]
  devid varchar
  name varchar
  location varchar
}

Table daydb {
  did int [primary key]
  uid int
  day date
  tstart time
  tend time
  hours float4
}

Ref: workdb.uid > userdb.uid
Ref: workdb.did > daydb.did
Ref: workdb.pid > projdb.pid

Ref: rfiddb.uid > userdb.uid
Ref: rfiddb.sid > scannerdb.sid

Ref: daydb.uid > userdb.uid
